lines.text: Huh, you seemed to get through the 5 Trials pretty well.
Ha ha I’m only kidding of course... Maybe.
Ok, maybe I’m making too light of the situation.
We’re fine, really! Just a bit shocked.
I managed to beat the 5 Trials myself too. But I got taken out by that bucket of bolts when I refused to step into that beam of light.
Seems like you made short work of it though. I’m impressed!
Anyway, let’s get out of here. You don’t know how much I need a drink right now.
